title: Define Quantum Algorithms for Problem Solving
description: Research and define a set of quantum algorithms suitable for solving complex problems.

title: Design Quantum Hardware Architecture
description: Design the physical architecture of the quantum computer, including qubit placement and interconnectivity.
dependencies: Define Quantum Algorithms for Problem Solving

title: Develop Quantum Circuit Simulator Software
description: Develop a software simulator to test and optimize quantum circuits.
dependencies: Define Quantum Algorithms for Problem Solving

title: Develop User Interface Design for QuantumPocketComputer
description: Design the user interface for the quantum computer, making it intuitive and accessible to users.

title: Implement Quantum Error Correction Techniques
description: Research and implement quantum error correction techniques to minimize errors in computation.

title: Test and Optimize Quantum Algorithms
description: Test the quantum algorithms on the simulator and optimize them for efficiency.
dependencies: Define Quantum Algorithms for Problem Solving

title: Manufacture Quantum Hardware Components
description: Design and manufacture the quantum hardware components, such as qubits and interconnects.

title: Assemble and Integrate Quantum Hardware Components
description: Assemble and integrate the quantum hardware components into a functional quantum computer.

title: Document QuantumPocketComputer Development Process
description: Write and maintain documentation of the development process, including design decisions, algorithms, and usage instructions.
